questions.question: I felt very comfortable using the NVVI tool with whistling.
Explain your experience using whistling to control the NVVI tool. For example, is whistling easy? Does it control the slider like you expect it to?
Compare your experiences of using whistling or humming to control the NVVI tool. For example, which was more comfortable? Which was more effective?
Overall, which approach would you use for the tool? (You may also choose both or neither)
